dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: The LibriSpeech corpus is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, providing a large dataset for training and evaluating automatic speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech corpus

dcterms:creator: E. Hadad
F. Heese
P. Vary
S. Gannot
dcterms:description: The Multichannel Impulse Response (MIR) database contains multichannel audio recordings in various acoustic environments, useful for studying sound localization and enhancement.
dcterms:title: Multichannel Impulse Response (MIR) database

dcterms:description: The DTU room acoustics dataset consists of reverberant acoustic impulse responses recorded in a classroom at the Technical University of Denmark from several source locations.
dcterms:title: DTU room acoustics dataset
